item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 19, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Valve releases Team Fortress 2 game code (1040 points | 240 comments)
2. A year of uv: pros, cons, and should you migrate (265 points | 116 comments)
3. Alice Hamilton waged a one-woman campaign to get the lead out of everything (91 points | 23 comments)
4. Why the Number Line Freaks Me Out (2016) (52 points | 21 comments)
5. Augment.vim: AI Chat and completion in Vim and Neovim (21 points | 4 comments)
6. The Unbrickable Pledge (21 points | 5 comments)
7. XOR (292 points | 46 comments)
8. Grim Fandango Puzzle Document (1996) [pdf] (71 points | 6 comments)
9. Show HN: Scripton – Python IDE with built-in realtime visualizations (348 points | 118 comments)
10. Little Sisyphus A physics-based platformer for the NES (33 points | 1 comment)
11. Launch HN: Promptless (YC W25) – Automatic updates for customer-facing docs (58 points | 37 comments)
12. Migraine is more than a headache – a rethink offers hope (95 points | 110 comments)
13. Parsing JSON in 500 lines of Rust (20 points | discuss)
14. Pi-hole v6 (393 points | 193 comments)
15. USDA fired officials working on bird flu, now trying to rehire them (60 points | 9 comments)
16. Implementing LLaMA3 in 100 Lines of Pure Jax (4 points | 1 comment)
17. My LLM codegen workflow (311 points | 107 comments)
18. Converge (YC S23) is hiring engineer #2 in NYC ( | hide)
19. Jean Hilliard's Minnesota Story (2018) (14 points | 1 comment)
20. OpenArc – Lightweight Inference Server for OpenVINO (5 points | discuss)
21. Why I'm writing a Scheme implementation in 2025: Async Rust (184 points | 71 comments)
22. Tensor evolution: A framework for fast tensor computations using recurrences (41 points | 8 comments)
23. HP Acquires Humane's AI Software (118 points | 107 comments)
24. South Korean regulator accuses DeepSeek of sharing user data with ByteDance (181 points | 88 comments)
25. Show HN: A GPU-accelerated binary vector index (45 points | 4 comments)
26. Are LLMs able to play the card game Set? (38 points | 25 comments)
27. Try thinking and learning without working memory (2008) (120 points | 59 comments)
28. Making my debug build run 100x faster so that it is finally usable (61 points | 13 comments)
29. Kafka at the low end: how bad can it get? (76 points | 51 comments)
30. Nuclear fusion: WEST beats the world record for plasma duration (249 points | 229 comments)
